images.prompt: A serene Zen garden on Mars, complete with red sand, alien plants, and a meditating astronaut
A post-apocalyptic world where nature has reclaimed the Earth, with lush forests growing through the remains of once-great cities
An ancient Egyptian-themed amusement park, complete with sphinxes, pyramids, and mummy mascots riding roller coasters
